ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and Heaven will be split apart, for that Day it will be very frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The sky will cleave asunder on that day and fall to pieces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the sky will be rent asunder, the grip holding it together having loosened on that Day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the heavens will be rent asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the heaven will split asunder – so on that day it will be unstable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the heaven will be rent asunder, for that Day it will be frail and torn up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the heaven shall cleave asunder, so that on that day it shall be frail,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and heaven shall be split, for upon that day it shall be very frail,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the heaven will split asunder, for that day it will be frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And the sky will be rent asunder, for on that Day it will be so frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the heaven shall be rent in sunder, it on that Day shall be frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the sky will be split open—for it will be frail on that day—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the sky will be rent asunder, for it will that Day be flimsy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the heaven will split asunder, for that Day it (the heaven will be frail (weak), and torn up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The heaven will be split; because on that Day it will be frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the heaven will crack; so on that Day it will be frail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:16] and the heaven will be rent asunder — for it will be very frail on that day —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the heaven will split asunder) out of awe for the Beneficent and the descent of the angels, (for that day it will be frail) and split.
